text: Mudashiru Ajayi Obasa (born 11 November 1972) is a Nigerian lawyer, politician and member of All Progressives Congress. He was born in Agege in Lagos, Nigeria. He had his primary education at St Thomas Acquinas Primary School, Surulere, Lagos. He then attended Archbishop Aggey Memorial Secondary school, Mushin, Ilasamaja, Lagos where he obtained the West Africa School Certificate. He received a bachelor's degree in law from Lagos State University, Lagos in the year 2006. == References == Category:Nigerian politicians Category:People from Lagos State Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian lawyers
title: Mudashiru Obasa
